title: Dirtpicker
lyrics:
Get yourself on a level
Check your vital signs
Is your head screwed on man
It’s alright, it's okay, it's just fine I don’t wanna do it

Drop yourself down a digit

Reflexes won’t hide

Mark my words man

‘Cause it’s true it’s all new

It’s so rare, It’s right there I don’t wanna do it



Bite your tongue stop the bleedin’

Swallow those sweet words

Too late babe ‘cause it’s coming on

There’s no way, there’s no chance

I won’t bend find another puppet



Let him be the way he is instead of putting him on a pedal

Images escape to him, he’s not here, he’s not there

It’s alright, I don’t care, I don’t wanna be the…
